Name: AggregationMethod
Description: Identification of the type of aggregation method used. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary. DDI strongly recommends the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: AggregationVariables
Description: Identifies the independent and dependent variables used in the aggregation process in-line.

Name: AggregationVariablesReference
Description: A reference to an existing AggregationVariables description.
